STUDENT WORK

Works by The Atelier School of Classical Realism Students

Dedication to learning and perfecting all aspects of their art is a hallmark of ASCR students, whether entering as a beginning art student or an established professional artist. That commitment shows in the exceptional quality of work produced at all levels of study in the programs. This sampling showcases some of their work.
